title: Trivia: Only military school to win a football state title in the GHSA
title_page: Trivia: Only military school to win a football state title in the GHSA
text:
Riverside Military's victory over Commerce was the first for the school against a ranked GHSA school. Riverside finished tied for first in its subregion of Region 8-A. What is the only military school to win a state championship in football in the GHSA? (Answer Tuesday)
Answer to Friday's question: James "Friday" Richards was the head coach for Marietta's region championship teams of 2005, 2004, 1996 and 1995. Richards, who retired after the 2009 season, passed away in June at age 64.
